title: New Insights into iodination mechanism of tyrosine and its dipeptides and comparison with chlorination and bromination reactions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00062E, Paper
Yue Qiu, Yongdong Liu, ru-gang zhong
Iodinated aromatic disinfection byproducts have attracted much attention due to their high toxicity, however, little has been known about iodination mechanism to date. In this study, iodination of model aromatic...
